about:
Dedicated Frontend Developer with a strong interest in building scalable and high-performance web
applications using React JS, Next JS, Node JS, and Express JS. Skilled at creating responsive user
interfaces, using Redux and Context API for state management, and building full-stack features like
checkout, cart, and authentication. Has worked on server-side rendering, page routing, and REST
API integration. Certified Kubernetes Administrator and AWS Cloud Practitioner with hands-on
experience in deploying applications using containers and managing cloud infrastructure.
